title: Первокурсницы
overview: A test comedy series starring Anna Ukolova and Ekaterina Stulova. Forty-year-old friends decide to return to the first year of university in order to correct the mistakes of youth and prove that it is never too late to start a new life. Zhanna and Nastya once studied together and lived in a dormitory, but left the institute after the first year. Nastya gave birth to twin sons and devoted herself to their upbringing, and Zhanna married a creative guy and had to work at several jobs to support her family. Years later, the friends meet, remember their unfulfilled dreams and decide to return to university to radically change their lives.
